author: EXM7777
text:
bookmarking AI threads & prompts feels productive...

until you check and realize you've used maybe 2% of them

here's what to do when you find a keeper:
- paste it into your favorite LLM
- ask: "break down why this works"
- ask: "adapt this for [your specific use case]"

understanding > collecting
 implementation > information

always

X is full of people collecting knowledge like pokemon cards but never playing the game

if you actually want to win, you know what to do
